description: The Chain Hereditary Form. For n > 0, let j(n) = A289342(n) and construct two intervals around j(n) of length r(n) = A288003(n): old = flip([j(n)-[0:r(n)-1]]) to the left of j(n) and new = [j(n)+[1:r(n)]] to the right of j(n). Let a(0) = 1; and for n > 0 and for each point in the intervals set a(new[1..r(n)]) = a(old[1..r(n)]) if l-fusc A288002(n) > 0 and a(new[1..r(n)]) = ~a(old[1..r(n)]) if l-fusc A288002(n) == 0.
